Class Broker.BrokerConMonitor

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      persistence.Broker.BrokerConMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Enclosing class:
Broker<E extends BusinessObject>
private class Broker.BrokerConMonitor
extends java.lang.Thread

Class to monitor a list of db connections for each broker, closing them when they are old and unused within a certain time period (default is 5 minutes) to prevent overuse of memory.

Version:
0.01.00
Author:
Daniel Kettle
